title: Pro Bike Check: Jeremiah Bishop’s very interesting Canyon Grail adventure bike
content:
If there was ever a racer who quite literally pushed their equipment to the extremes, it’s Jeremiah Bishop. His Canyon Grail has carried him thousands of miles across some of the hardest terrain as he’s ridden and filmed the Impossible Routes series. It’s also his race bike, carrying him across the line at SBT GRVL

The post Pro Bike Check: Jeremiah Bishop’s very interesting Canyon Grail adventure bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
